value: introducing key, value concept and how to define an object and access its properties

//Concept of objects
var task = {
'id' : 1,
'task': 'Complete the JS course',
'status': 'Pending'
}
console.log(task)
console.log(task['id'])

//Create a list of objects
taskList = [{
'id' : 1,
'task': 'Complete the JS course',
'status': 'Pending'
},
{
'id' : 2,
'task': 'Complete the CSS course',
'status': 'Pending'
},
{
'id' : 3,
'task': 'Cook the food',
'status': 'Complete'
}]
var listLength = taskList.length;
var index = 0;
while(index < listLength)
console.log(taskList[i]);
index = index + 1;
}
